body.title: Using the Maven 2 plugin for the Castor XML Code Generator

section.title: Maven 2 plugin for the Castor XML code generator
section.p: For those of you working with Maven 2 instead of Ant, the Maven 2 plugin for Castor can be used to integrate source code generation from XML schemas with the Castor XML code generator as part of the standard Maven build life-cycle. The following sections show how to configure the Maven 2 Castor plugin and hwo to instruct Maven 2 to generate sources from your XML schemas.
